Scans¶

Table of contents

  • MAD Scans
  • XRF Scans
  • XAS Scans

The Scans View is the primary location for spectroscopic measurements such as MAD Scans, X-Ray fluorescence scans, and X-Ray Absorption spectroscopy Scans.
